title: Create New Knowledge Base Article
description: After handling a recurring question multiple times, a support agent decides to create a knowledge base article to enable self-service.

tasks.description: Identify a common, recurring customer question that is not yet documented.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies that many users ask how to set up two-factor authentication.

tasks.description: Write a clear, step-by-step guide with screenshots explaining how to set up 2FA.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent drafts a high-quality help article.

tasks.description: Publish the article to the public knowledge base and add relevant keywords for searchability.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully publishes the article, making it available to all users.
